name: Max Payne 3: Hostage Negotiation Map Pack
name_original: Max Payne 3: Hostage Negotiation Map Pack
description:
Max Payne 3: Hostage Negotiation Map Pack is an action-shooter game developed by Rockstar Vancouver. It was originally released in 2012. Rockstar Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Max Payne 3: Hostage Negotiation Map Pack is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
